fulltext:
CURRICULUM VITAE 
PERSONAL DETAILS 
Full Name: Hà Huy Vũ 
Position: Senior Java Developer 
Date of birth: Oct 7th, 1992 
Phone: 0393675365 
Email: hahuyvu0710@gmail.com 
Address: 15A 48 St, Ward 16, District 8, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam 
OBJECTIVE: To have a good opportunity to work independently or as a part of a dynamic team where I 
could make a significant contribution and develop as well as improve myself in both technical and soft skills. 
SUMMARY 
● Java programming capabilities well with more than 4 years' experience.  
● Good experience on Java Core, Spring boot, Spring Microservice, Spring Cloud, Spring Security, 
Spring Data JPA, Hibernate 
● Good experience with Frontend: HTML5, CSS, Javascript, jQuery, AngularJS 
● Good knowledge of Search Engine as ElasticSearch 
● Good knowledge of Message Queue as Kafka 
● Good knowledge of Keycloak, JBPM, JBOSS server 
● Have experience in GitLab CI/CD 
● Passionate about computer programming, willing to learn new technology. 
SKILLS 
Technology: 
● JAVA, JDBC, Thymeleaf 
● HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 
● Javascript, Jquery, AngularJS 
● UML, OOAD, OOP, SQL 
Framework: 
● Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA, SpringMVC, Spring Security, 
Spring Cloud Eureka - Microservice, Hibernate 
● Keycloak, JBPM (Jboss Business Process Management) 
● Vert.x 
Soft skills: 
● Research and solve problem quickly. 
● Work independently. 
● Have positive attitude in team working, work and time 
organization. 
● Prefer supporting team member. 
Resume of Ha Huy Vu 
Page 1 of 3 
Foreign Languages: 
● English (intermediate) 
● Vietnamese (native) 
Others: 
● WebService: RESTful 
● Database: MySQL, Oracle 
● Search Engine: ElasticSearch 
● Message Queue: Kafka 
● GitLab CI/CD 
EDUCATION 
Time 
Institution and Degree 
From 2011 to 2015 
● University: Ho Chi Minh City University of Education 
● Faculty: B.S of Information Technology 
● Diploma: IT Engineering 
● Grade: Good 
WORKING EXPERIENCE 
JobHop (11/2018 - Present) - Software Backend Engineer 
Project Name: 
JobHop Backend Service 
From: 11/2018 
To: Present 
Project Description: 
JobHop automatically “score” your profile and recommend 
suitable jobs. With AI, we developed a new smart job 
searching to help you finding the best hop 
Project size: 
2 developers 
- Database Structure and Design for system 
- Building a microservices with Spring Boot and Spring 
Cloud 
- Authenticate using Facebook Login and Google Login 
- Implementing logging with custom Spring AOP Annotation 
Responsibilities: 
- Sending email with Mailgun 
- Integrate payment gateway with NganLuong 
- Integrate ElasticSearch for system 
- Scheduling with google calendar api java 
- Deploy application with GitLab CI/CD

Business Service Desk 
From: 04/2017 
To: 07/2017 
Project Description: 
Project manage ticket process for departments

output)

MoMo e-wallet is a financial application that allows to 
receive and receive money Super fast, easy to use and 
absolutely safe 
Project size: 
5 developers

to manage POS,
